sys_script_include.name: FetchDependencyAppVersion

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_08213194eba802105387f734bad0cd22
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_app_inv.FetchDependencyAppVersion</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>FetchDependencyAppVersion</name><script><![CDATA[var FetchDependencyAppVersion = Class.create();
FetchDependencyAppVersion.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getAppVersion: function() {
		

        var dependencyAppName = this.getParameter('dependency_app');
			
        var appDetailsGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_app_inv_app_details');
        if (appDetailsGr.get('sys_id', dependencyAppName)) {
			
			
			var ans=appDetailsGr.getValue('version');
            return ans;
			
        }
        return '';
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-20 03:54:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>08213194eba802105387f734bad0cd22</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FetchDependencyAppVersion</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Management System" source="x_snc_app_inv">e6c5a74deb94c6105387f734bad0cd21</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Application Management System">e6c5a74deb94c6105387f734bad0cd21</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_08213194eba802105387f734bad0cd22</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-20 03:54:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
